# sstparcelunion.createOrReplaceTempView("sstparcelunion")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stlmstrack
AS
SELECT 

t.ID as lms_track_id,
t.LoadID as lms_track_loadid,
t.ParcelID as lms_track_parcelid,
t.fromlocid as lms_track_fromlocid,
t.tolocid as lms_track_tolocid,
t.TrackTypeID as lms_track_tracktypeid,
t.TrackTypeID2 as lms_track_tracktypeid2,
t.OpenDt as lms_track_opendt,
t.CloseDt as lms_track_closedt,
t.specdel as lms_track_specdel,
COALESCE(l.parentloadid,l.id) as lms_track_loadparenetloadid,
p.weight as lms_track_parcelweight,
p.chargeweight as lms_track_parcelchargeweight,
p.volweight as lms_track_parcelvolweight,
p.totcharge as lms_track_parceltotcharge,
p.billcustid as lms_track_orderbillcustid,
p.pickupcustid as lms_track_orderpickupcustid,
p.delivercustid as lms_track_orderdelivercustid,
p.consignid as lms_track_parcelconsignid,
p.orderid as lms_track_parcelorderid,
CASE 
    WHEN t.ParcelID <> t.lag THEN 1
    ELSE  0
END as lms_track_lastmilebranchflag,
w.lms_waybillsperparcel_waybillid as lms_track_waybillid,
w.lms_waybillsperparcel_rdate as lms_track_rdate,
w.lms_waybillsperparcel_returnedflag as lms_track_returnedflag,
-- w.lms_waybillsperparcel_orvdeliverydate as lms_track_orvdeliverydate,
-- w.lms_waybillsperparcel_orvreasondetailid as lms_track_orvreasondetailid,
w.lms_waybillsperparcel_dooruserid as lms_track_dooruserid,
w.lms_waybillsperparcel_doordeliverydate as lms_track_doordeliverydate,
w.lms_waybillsperparcel_stationid as lms_track_stationid,
w.lms_waybillsperparcel_doorreasondetailid as lms_track_doorreasondetailid,
w.lms_waybillsperparcel_doorcomment as lms_track_doorcomment,
w.lms_waybillsperparcel_debriefuserid as lms_track_debriefuserid,
w.lms_waybillsperparcel_debriefdeliverydate as lms_track_debriefdeliverydate,
w.lms_waybillsperparcel_debriefcomment as lms_track_debriefcomment,
w.lms_waybillsperparcel_debriefreasondetailid as lms_track_debriefreasondetailid,
w.lms_waybillsperparcel_reasonupdates as lms_track_reasonupdates,
w.lms_waybillsperparcel_callprogid as lms_track_callprogid

FROM ssttrackunion t
LEFT JOIN sstwaybillsperparcel w on w.lms_waybillsperparcel_loadid = t.loadid and w.lms_waybillsperparcel_parcelid = t.parcelid
LEFT JOIN sstparcelunion p on p.id = t.parcelid
LEFT JOIN dboloads l on l.id = t.loadid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stvsmparcel_tmp1
AS
SELECT DISTINCT
     t.lms_track_parcelid
FROM stlmstrack t

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stvsmparcel_tmp2
AS
SELECT DISTINCT
     t.lms_track_parcelid
    ,max(t.lms_track_closedt) as lms_track_enddate

FROM stlmstrack t
WHERE t.lms_track_tracktypeid = 2
GROUP BY t.lms_track_parcelid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stvsmparcel_tmp3
AS
SELECT DISTINCT
     t.lms_track_parcelid
    ,max(t.lms_track_opendt) as lms_track_floortimeend

FROM stlmstrack t
WHERE t.lms_track_tracktypeid = 6
GROUP BY t.lms_track_parcelid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stvsmparcel_tmp4
AS
SELECT DISTINCT
     t.lms_track_parcelid
    ,max(t.lms_track_opendt) as lms_track_opendt

FROM stlmstrack t
WHERE t.lms_track_closedt IS NULL and t.lms_track_tracktypeid = 6
GROUP BY t.lms_track_parcelid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stvsmparcel_tmp5
AS
SELECT DISTINCT
     t.lms_track_parcelid
    ,t.lms_track_opendt
    ,t2.lms_track_fromlocid

FROM  stvsmparcel_tmp4 t
LEFT JOIN stlmstrack t2 on t2.lms_track_parcelid = t.lms_track_parcelid AND t2.lms_track_opendt = t.lms_track_opendt
WHERE t2.lms_track_closedt IS NULL and t2.lms_track_tracktypeid = 6

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stvsmparcel
AS
SELECT 
    t1.lms_track_parcelid
    ,t2.lms_track_enddate
    ,t3.lms_track_floortimeend
    ,t5.lms_track_fromlocid
FROM stvsmparcel_tmp1 t1 
LEFT JOIN stvsmparcel_tmp2 t2 ON t2.lms_track_parcelid =t1.lms_track_parcelid 
LEFT JOIN stvsmparcel_tmp3 t3 ON t3.lms_track_parcelid =t1.lms_track_parcelid 
LEFT JOIN stvsmparcel_tmp5 t5 ON t5.lms_track_parcelid =t1.lms_track_parcelid
